name: Floorplans
author: Paramount Construction

sections.description:
This highly customizable floorplans plugins uses custom post types to make your website display a catalog of floorplans.

Special Features:

  • Each floorplan is sortable and filterable.
  • Create and manage your own floorplan styles and collections
  • Floorplan page is widgetized so you can drag around the image gallery, features, floorplan stats, and any other widgets you want.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the floorplans plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Start creating floorplans
  4. Create an overview listing of floorplans by adding [floorplan_overview_page] to a page or post.

short_description: Create a catalog of sortable, filterable, and searchable floorplans with image and video galleries.
